SQLTest.TestStatement: SELECT 'true' FROM DBVersion where history not like '%797.66%';

SQLDocument.SQLStatement: update DBVersion set history = history + ',797.66' where history not like '%797.66%';

UPDATE VIEW_TEMPLATE SET VWT_VIEW_DEFINITION = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- #TEMPLATE-ID [form.sped-il-3457f] -->
<template> <tab name="Parent Consent (34-57F)"> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">PARENT/GUARDIAN CONSENT FOR INITIAL PROVISION OF</text> </line> <line align="center" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">SPECIAL EDUCATION AND RELATED SERVICES</text> </line> <line shaded="true"> <spacer/> </line> <line align="left" shaded="true"> <property alias="is-date" label="Date" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell align="left" border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <text>Dear Parent/Guardian</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text>At a recent conference your child was recommended for initial provision of special education and related services and an Individualized education Program (IEP) was developed. Before a school district can provide the special education services described in your child''s IeP, your informed written consent is required. Your consent is voluntary and you may revoke your consent at anytime. If you revoke consent, it does not negate an action that occurred after the consent was given and before it was revoked.</text> </line> <line shaded="true"> <spacer/> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="middle">CHECK ONE:</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="3" line-span="1"> <property alias="is-consent" label-display="right"/> <spacer width="100" /> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="30" line-span="1"> <text>For the initial special education and related services of my child as indicated on the Individualized education Program (IEP). The proposed special education and related service(s) have been fully explained to me and are consistent with the IEP developed for my child.</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="3" line-span="1"> <text> </text> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="30" line-span="1"> <text>I understand that my consent is voluntary. I understand that my consent is not required for continued services or change in services/placement. At least annually, I will be given reasonable opportunity for comment on and input into my child''s IEP.</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="3" line-span="1"> <text> </text> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="30" line-span="1"> <text>I received a copy of the </text>><text bold="true">Explanation of Procedural Safeguards</text><text> which have been fully explained to me by school personnel, including the procedures for requesting an impartial due process hearing.</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="3" line-span="1"> <text> </text> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="30" line-span="1"> <text>I understand that as soon as possible following development of the IEP, but not more than ten (10) calendar days, special education and related services will be provided to my child in accordance with the IEP.</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="3" line-span="1"> <property alias="is-not-consent" label-display="right"/> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="30" line-span="1"> <text>For the special education and related services of my child as indicated in the Individualized education Program (IEP).</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="3" line-span="1"> <text> </text> </cell> <cell border="none" cell-span="30" line-span="1"> <text>I understand that the school district will not be in violation of the requirement to make available a free appropriate public education for my child if I refuse to give consent.</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> Director" label-short="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="pws" foreign-id="stfNameView" label="Person who will sign" label-short="false"> <picklist required="true" extended-dictionary="SPED-IL-3457F"> <field id="stfNameView" sort="true" /> <filter connector="and" field="stfStatus" operator="equals" source="preference" value="sys.stf.activeCode" /> <filter connector="and" field="stfSpedInd" operator="equals" source="constant" value="true" /> </picklist> </property> </line> </block> </row> </tab> </template>' WHERE VWT_OID = 'vwtX2IL3457f' AND (VWT_CUSTOM_IND <> '1' OR VWT_CUSTOM_IND IS NULL);

UPDATE VIEW_TEMPLATE SET VWT_VIEW_DEFINITION = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- #TEMPLATE-ID [form.sped-il-3457h] --> <template> <tab> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text font-size="large" bold="true">PARENT/GUARDIAN EXCUSAL OF AN INDIVIDUALIZED EDUCATION PROGRAM TEAM MEMBER</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property font-size="medium" alias="date" label-short="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell align="left" border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <text font-size="medium">Dear Parent/Guardian</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">An IEP Team meeting is scheduled for your child on</text> <property alias="iep-meeting-date" label-display="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">We</text> <property alias="met-in-person" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">met in person</text> <property alias="spoke-phone" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">spoke on the phone</text> <property alias="exch-e-mails" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">exchanged e-mails</text> <property alias="ex-faxes" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">exchanged faxes</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">and agreed to the following:</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Allowing team members to be excused from attending and IEP meeting is intended to provide additional flexibility to parents in scheduling meetings. The presence and participation of the Individualized Education Program (IEP) team member(s) identified below is/are not necessary and has/have been excused from being present and participating in the meeting. The "team member" is described in the regulations as, the general education teacher, special education teacher, LEA representative, and/or an individual who can interpret the instructional implications of evaluation results, who may be a member of the team already identified.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <spacer height="10" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="true">Content area of excused member not discussed at the meeting</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="not-discussed" label="Applies to Meeting" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">The school district and parent/guardian agree the following member(s) is/are not required to attend the IEP meeting in whole or in part because the individual''s area of curriculum, content or related service will not be discussed or modified.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 1</text> <property alias="name-area1" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 2</text> <property alias="name-area2" label-display="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 3</text> <property alias="name-area3" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 4</text> <property alias="name-area4" label-display="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <spacer height="10" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="true">Content area of excused member discussed at the meeting</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="discussed" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">The school district and parent/guardian agree the following member(s) may be excused from attending the IEP meeting in whole or in part, when the meeting involves a modification to or discussion of the member''s area of the curriculum or related services, if the member submits input into the IEP in writing to the parent and to the teacher prior to the meeting.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 1</text> <property alias="name-area-disc-1" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 2</text> <property alias="name-area-disc-2" label-display="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 3</text> <property alias="name-area-disc-3" label-display="false" /> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">Name/Area 4</text> <property alias="name-area-disc-4" label-display="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <spacer height="10" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="pws" font-size="medium" foreign-id="stfNameView" label="Case Coordinator" label-short="false"> <picklist required="true" extended-dictionary="SPED-IL-3457A"> <field id="stfNameView" sort="true" /> <filter connector="and" field="stfStatus" operator="equals" source="preference" value="sys.stf.activeCode" /> <filter connector="and" field="stfSpedInd" operator="equals" source="constant" value="true" /> </picklist> </property> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <text font-size="medium" bold="false">If you have any questions or would like a copy of</text> <text font-size="medium" bold="true">Explanation of Procedural </cell> </line> </block> </row> </tab> </template>' WHERE VWT_OID = 'vwtX2IL3457h' AND (VWT_CUSTOM_IND <> '1' OR VWT_CUSTOM_IND IS NULL);

UPDATE VIEW_TEMPLATE SET VWT_VIEW_DEFINITION = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- #TEMPLATE-ID [form.sped-il-3457i] -->
<template> <tab> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">PARENT/GUARDIAN AND STUDENT NOTIFICATION OF TRANSFER OR RIGHTS DUE TO AGE OF MAJORITY</text> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small">Date </text> <property alias="date-request" label-display="hide" /> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <cell align="left" border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <text bold="true">Dear Parent/Guardian</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small">When a student with a disability reaches 18 years of age (the age of majority under State law) all educational rights transfer from the parent(s)/guardian(s) to the student. The Individuals with Disabilities education Act (IDEA) requires that both parent(s)/guardian(s) and the student receive notice of the transfer of educational rights one year prior to the student''s eighteenth birthday. However, the parent(s)/guardian(s) will continue to receive the ten day notice prior to the date of any special education meeting after the student turns eighteen.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small">On the date of age of majority, all rights pertaining to the special education program/services shall transfer from the parent(s)/guardian(s) to the student unless the school district is otherwise notified ( e.g. Delegation of Rights to Make Educational Decisions form).</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small">Date of age of majority:</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="age_majority" label-display="hide" /> </line> </block> </row> <row> <block> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small" >CHECK ONE:</text> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="is-prior-notice" value="-1" bold="true" font-size="small" >Not chosen.</radio> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="is-prior-notice" value="1" bold="true" font-size="small" >This serves as your one (1) year prior notice of the anticipated transfer of educational rights to the above named student under IDEA.</radio> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <radio alias="is-prior-notice" value="0" bold="true" font-size="small" >This serves as your notice that all educational rights under IDEA have been transferred to the above named student.</radio> </cell> </line> </block> </row>
<row> <block> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small">If your have any question concerning this procedure or require an additional copy of your rights, The Explanation of Procedural Safeguards, Please contact:</text> </line> <line align="left" shaded="true"> <property alias="pgstr-pmd" label-display="hide" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small">person who will sign: </text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="pws" foreign-id="stfNameView" label-display="hide" > <picklist required="true" extended-dictionary="SPED-IL-3457A"> <field id="stfNameView" sort="true" /> <filter connector="and" field="stfStatus" operator="equals" source="preference" value="sys.stf.activeCode" /> <filter connector="and" field="stfSpedInd" operator="equals" source="constant" value="true" /> </picklist> </property> </line>
</block> </row> </tab> </template>' WHERE VWT_OID = 'vwtX2IL3457i' AND (VWT_CUSTOM_IND <> '1' OR VWT_CUSTOM_IND IS NULL);
